channel.title: Pimpscape, Auto/fast Attacking!
channel.description:
In my server, i have the problem that when you keep clicking on the other guy it keeps attacking them.
Anyone know how to solve this...?
If I can do this then my server will be close to complete. So please...
Thanks.

item.title: Pimpscape, Auto/fast Attacking!
item.dc:creator: @archerkill30 archerkill30
item.description:
@archerkill30 wrote:

[quote=“bartiscool22, post:13, topic:55009”]Phonecheck’s way is the real version.
Just change all that PkingDelays to another number and it will change.
I thought Pimpscape hasn’t that option…

search for

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip { PkingDelay = 3;
and change the PkingDelay part to

LoopAttDelay

Tell me if that helps.

Is the good version.

Btw Wooker about your sig.

BEANIE LOLZ NOBODY CARES THAT YOUR MOD LOL. NO NEED TO TELL US YOU’LL REPORT ABUSIVE PMS… WHO WOULDN’T???LOLOLOLOLOL.

A CM pissing a mod off like that?
Everyone will report them.
But if im right like god told.
He can report posts straight to G.Mods, and all reports we normal members make will be sent to the report forum where all reports go to.
Thats what Ikiliki’s community rs2gods has and I thought he told mopar had it to.
Or I was dreaming.[/quote]

Okay so I change
“PkingDelay = 3;” to “LoopAttDelay” or “LoopAttDelay = 3”

Read full topic

item.title: Pimpscape, Auto/fast Attacking!
item.dc:creator: @bartiscool22 bartiscool22
item.description:
@bartiscool22 wrote:

Phonecheck’s way is the real version.
Just change all that PkingDelays to another number and it will change.
I thought Pimpscape hasn’t that option…

[quote=“Phonecheck, post:4, topic:55009”]search for

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip { PkingDelay = 3;
and change the PkingDelay part to

LoopAttDelay

Tell me if that helps.[/quote]
Is the good version.

Btw Wooker about your sig.

BEANIE LOLZ NOBODY CARES THAT YOUR MOD LOL. NO NEED TO TELL US YOU'LL REPORT ABUSIVE PMS.. WHO WOULDN'T?!?!?!?LOLOLOLOLOL.
A CM pissing a mod off like that? Everyone will report them. But if im right like god told. He can report posts straight to G.Mods, and all reports we normal members make will be sent to the report forum where all reports go to. Thats what Ikiliki's community rs2gods has and I thought he told mopar had it to. Or I was dreaming.

Read full topic

item.title: Pimpscape, Auto/fast Attacking!
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

[quote=“masterp00n, post:11, topic:55009”]What i think it is its a glithch because on testscape i was pking on darkscape2007 and i killed some1 then i was getting attacked rapidly and i did not see who it was but i quickly typed ::saveme and went bak to ::pk and there was a guy there at the exact same spot i was getting attacked on…so yah i think its a glithc or maybe[/quote]Clueless… Unless you set your server up so people can’t mass click, they will mass click.

Read full topic

item.title: Pimpscape, Auto/fast Attacking!
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

PkingDelay = LoopAttDelay;

Dont have that… :S[br][size=1]Posted on: February 04, 2007, 05:50:31 PM[/size][hr]LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay;

I have 4 of them though.

Read full topic

item.title: Pimpscape, Auto/fast Attacking!
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

[quote=“Y0_J0k3r, post:5, topic:55009”]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip { LoopAttDelay = 6; wepdelay = 6; }

Thats what I use…And when you attack with whip, nothing happens at all. The animation works but no damage is dealt…[/quote]
Change it back to PkingDelay and search for

PkingDelay = LoopAttDelay;

Change it to

PkingDelay = LoopAttDelay+7;

Read full topic

item.title: Pimpscape, Auto/fast Attacking!
item.dc:creator: @Y0_J0k3r Y0_J0k3r
item.description:
@Y0_J0k3r wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip { LoopAttDelay = 6; wepdelay = 6; }

Thats what I use…And when you attack with whip, nothing happens at all. The animation works but no damage is dealt…

Read full topic
